title: My Husband Really Enjoyed The Prom
itunes:title: My Husband Really Enjoyed The Prom
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for 11 years and I have one daughter that’s 15 and my husband and I have an 8 year old. My husband is a great man and he stepped up to be a father to my daughter, whose biological father passed away. My husband is a tutor at my daughter’s school and he volunteers at events as a makeshift security guard at the school.......................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for 11 years and I have one daughter that’s 15 and my husband and I have an 8 year old. My husband is a great man and he stepped up to be a father to my daughter, whose biological father passed away. My husband is a tutor at my daughter’s school and he volunteers at events as a makeshift security guard at the school.......................
